name: places/ChIJxxVVjAVZwokRBY9e9cQptjo
formattedAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016-4974, USA

originalText.text: Not a great experience, service or care. Misogynistic overtones in my initial consultation and he was anti functional medicine / eastern medicine practices to support western medicine treatments. It is hard to get an appointment with any Endocrinologist in NYC so I was happy to get one here. Not worth it.

text.text: Not a great experience, service or care. Misogynistic overtones in my initial consultation and he was anti functional medicine / eastern medicine practices to support western medicine treatments. It is hard to get an appointment with any Endocrinologist in NYC so I was happy to get one here. Not worth it.

originalText.text: My experience with Dr. K was fantastic.  He is professional and intelligent.  He asked me questions that brought out information I didn't even realize that I knew.  He spoke to me as if I were an intelligent human and treated me with the highest level of respect.  The office staff was friendly and  efficient.  I was in and out of my appointment (although had a very thorough conversation with the doctor, was physically examined, and had a blood draw) within 30 mins.  Very professional and efficient office--highly recommended.

originalText.text: I was very pleased with the professionalism of the doctor. His office staff was very nice and informative. The doctor personally called me back with my lab results and recommendations. Being in the healthcare field as a nurse practitioner I appreciated the care and service I received.

text.text: I was very pleased with the professionalism of the doctor. His office staff was very nice and informative. The doctor personally called me back with my lab results and recommendations. Being in the healthcare field as a nurse practitioner I appreciated the care and service I received.

originalText.text: The most horrible, rushed, dismissive and arrogant doctor and experience I’ve EVER HAD!! I work in the medical industry and never have I ever encounter such terrible service. I understand the Bussiness side of the medical field. What about the HUMAN SIDE. Choose wisely and be an advocate for your health and rights!

text.text: The most horrible, rushed, dismissive and arrogant doctor and experience I’ve EVER HAD!! I work in the medical industry and never have I ever encounter such terrible service. I understand the Bussiness side of the medical field. What about the HUMAN SIDE. Choose wisely and be an advocate for your health and rights!

originalText.text:
By far the worst endocrinologist I have seen in my 12 years of thyroid disease. He is dismissive, disrespectful, and combative.
Dr. Kinkhabwala and his nurse lied to me about doing a full thyroid panel, later insisting only TSH matters and refusing to do any other test (though I paid for my labs and the visit, and I confirmed with Dr. Kinkhabwala, the nurse who drew my blood, and the girls at the desk before leaving his office)!
When trying to fill my Rx, he changed my medication from Nature-Throid to Armour--which I cannot take due to corn allergy, and he wrote a note in my chart stating NOT to prescribe Nature-Throid, just before he left for a week's vacation. My pharmacy could not fill due to his note, and they were in shock, as I've been taking Nature-Throid for years! The pharmacy told me I must find a new doctor immediately.
My experience with Dr. Sanjiv Kinkhabwala was so awful--he WILL NOT LISTEN TO YOU as a patient, and will speak to you condescendingly. I highly recommend finding any other endocrinologist in NYC.
